Class Animal

  • java.lang.Object
    • Animal
  • public class Animal
extends java.lang.Object
    An Animal object is an animal character, displayed on the screen that can go left, go right, jump, speak, "think" or shout a phrase, introduce itself,

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      static double STEP  

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      Animal​(java.lang.String typeOfAnimal, java.lang.String nameOfAnimal, double x, double y)
      Constructor requires - the type of animal, - the name of the animal, - and the coordinates (left, top) of where it should be placed.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void diagonal​(double dist)  
      void diagonalDown​(double dist)  
      void goLeft​(double dist)
      move the Animal to the left
      void goRight​(double dist)
      Make the Animal face to the right and then move the specified distance to the right
      void introduce​(java.lang.String greeting)
      makes the Animal introduce itself with a greeting word
      void jump​(double dist)
      move the Animal up then down
      void shout​(java.lang.String words)
      makes the Animal shout in big block letter
      void speak​(java.lang.String words)
      makes the Animal say something in a speech box
      void think​(java.lang.String words)
      makes the Animal think something in a speech bubble

    • Constructor Detail

      • Animal

        public Animal​(java.lang.String typeOfAnimal,
              java.lang.String nameOfAnimal,
              double x,
              double y)
        Constructor requires - the type of animal, - the name of the animal, - and the coordinates (left, top) of where it should be placed. For example new Animal("dog", "Scruff", 100, 50);
